description:
The Clementine Group is a creator agency at the intersection of creators, music, brands, and technology. We work with influencers exclusively & non-exclusively assisting with monetization, networking, 360 management, events, and consulting. Our creator network includes a wide range of dancers, fashionistas, comedians, tech, fitness, lifestyle, and more. Brands we have worked with include Fortune 500 companies, tech startups, fashion powerhouses, and everything in between. We also work with every major record label and many independent labels to break the next viral song. No two projects are the same and the industry is constantly evolving.

Founded by two young entrepreneurs, we grew up in the digital landscape. The team is composed of hustlers with a burning passion for what we do. We are remote-first but operate mainly out of Los Angeles & San Diego. Our ideal candidate is someone who is self-driven, innovative, organized, and fun-loving. Humans make companies, not credentials.

OVERVIEW:

The creator coordinator will be a point of contact for creators at Clementine. Overseeing and expanding our network of creators ensuring we have great relationships and contacts in every niche.



RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Establish, nurture, and manage relationships with our network of creators
  • Source, identify, and recruit creators that align with our brand values
  • Assist in pitching and sourcing creators for new opportunities
  • Manage and organize our internal database of creators, ensuring it is up-to-date and accurate
  • Contribute to team brainstorms and campaign ideation
  • Support the music & brand teams in identifying growing creators that align with client goals
  • Build out partnerships within the creator economy that allow for greater collaboration

QUALIFICATIONS:

  • 18+ years old
  • Exceptional communication & interpersonal skills that are timely and professional
  • Highly detail-oriented and organized, able to manage multiple tasks simultaneously
  • Consistently meet deadline requirements
  • Passion for TikTok and social media; having experience or connections with influencers is preferred
  • Ability and desire to go above and beyond to satisfy clients and creators
  • Fun, positive, and motivated to grow with a small, yet rapidly growing company
  • Proficient in G-Suite and technology (Sheets, Drive, Gmail, Slack + other collaborative tools)
